goal.en: "The student will be introduced to many of the aspects of flexible and rigid pavement and design for both airports and highways. Upon completion of the course, the student should have a working knowledge of soil properties and their effects on design as subgrades, subbases, and bases; materials and common uses, pavement evaluation and maintenance; with special emphasis on structural design of flexible and rigid pavements."
goal.ch: "The student will be introduced to many of the aspects of flexible and rigid pavement and design for both airports and highways. Upon completion of the course, the student should have a working knowledge of soil properties and their effects on design as subgrades, subbases, and bases; materials and common uses, pavement evaluation and maintenance; with special emphasis on structural design of flexible and rigid pavements."

content.en:
"1. Introduction
2. Stresses and strains in flexible pavement
3. Stressesa nd deflections in rigid pavements
4. Teaffic analysis
5. Materials and construction
6. Reliability considerations
7. Design of flexible pavements
8. Design of rigid pavements
9. Pavement maintenance and evaluation
10. New developments"

flex_desc.en: A term paper will be assigned for weeks 17-18 of the semester. The topic of the term paper will be based on practical technical needs in pavement engineering. Students are encouraged to discuss with the instructor for development of possible solutions to the term project.
flex_desc.ch: 學期第17-18週將採學期報告型式，依據課程16週所學內容，發展應用於專案期末報告。將採用鋪面工程實際遭遇之問題或困難為本，採用教練輔導方式針對專案需求發展解決問題的方法，並提出學期期末報告。
